A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars story ever\, the writers suck\, but the filming quality of the scenes were awesome but not good enough to save the Star Wars Universe\, it has been destroyed due to this film a complete disrespect to the lore and character development created in all the past films\, wtf went wrong! 30+ years of being a fan (39 y.o. currently). The kid inside mourned.
